bookedMeetings.longDescription:
testing meeting room info
with all the details:

- detail 1
- detail 2
- detail 3

Hi, We are sending you this email to inform you about our second session of the year! This second session will feature ViroReact. A framework for rapidly building multiplatform AR/VR applications on Android and IOS. The session will take place on May 17'th from 18:00 till 20:00 in the C01 meeting room. Food will be provided for those who accept the meeting invitation. This session will be hosted by Ryan De Gruyter and Michael Vandendriessche whom I would like to thank in advance for their efforts towards the competence center. Hope to see you all there! Kind regards, Kevin Van den Abeele - Internet of Things Competence Leader
bookedMeetings.organisers: Kevin Van den Abeele, Ryan De Gruyter, Michael Vandendriessche
